name: Len Sutton
introduction: Len Sutton (born 9 August 1925 and died 3 December 2006) was an American racing driver who participated in the USAC Championship Car series from 1955 to 1965. His participation in the Indianapolis 500 in 1960 and earlier were counted towards the Formula One championship. Although he never managed to finish the race while it was part of the F1 calendar, he did finish 2nd in the 1962 Indianapolis 500.
